titleInfo.title: Division and the Three Brigade Staff Meeting

mods.abstract: Military personnel from the three brigades of the Tennessee State Guard with Governor Prentice Cooper on the steps of the Tennessee State Capitol.

Governor Prentice Cooper is shown with Staff of the Division on the steps of the State Capitol. The governor led a tireless drive to mobilize the state for World War II. This effort would include the formation of the Tennessee State Guard in 1941. He was the Commander-in-chief of the Tennessee State Guard, and he would remain actively involved in their operations.
